1.heading: Todd.
1.title: Pokémon Snap
1.author: Jason R
notes: Summary (from OCLC): Todd must help Professor Oak, a famous Pokémon researcher, find and photograph all 63 types of Pokémon living on Pokémon Island. He journeys through rivers, valleys, volcanoes and caves to snap the coolest Pokémon pics
find out where the wild Pokémon are hiding and how Todd discovers them all. As you enjoy the story, you will get clues and strategies that you can use in the Nintendo 64 game.
